weaponWarrior1Notes: Common soldier's blade. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior2Notes: Double-bitted battle-axe. Increases STR by <%= str %>
weaponWarrior3Notes: Heavy club with brutal spikes. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior4Notes: Sword whose edge bites like the north wind. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior5Notes: Weapon whose forge-glow never fades. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior6Notes: Bane of creatures of darkness. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue0Notes: A rogue's most basic weapon. Confers no benefit.
weaponRogue1Notes: Light, concealable blade. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue2Notes: Slashing sword, swift to deliver a killing blow. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue3Notes: Distinctive bush knife, both survival tool and weapon. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue4Notes: Heavy batons whirled about on a length of chain. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue5Notes: Sleek and deadly as the ninja themselves. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue6Notes: Complex weapon adept at ensnaring and disarming opponents. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponWizard1Notes: Basic implement of carven wood. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard2Notes: Focuses power through a precious stone. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard3Notes: Plated in metal to channel heat, cold, and lightning. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard4Notes: As powerful as it is heavy. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard5Notes: Assists in weaving the most complex of spells. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard6Notes: Fashioned of orichalcum, the alchemic gold, mighty and rare. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponHealer0Notes: For healers in training. Confers no benefit.
weaponHealer1Notes: Crafted during a healer's initiation. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer2Notes: Topped with a gem bearing curative properties. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer3Notes: Purifies poison at a touch. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer4Notes: As much a badge of office as a healing tool. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer5Notes: Fit to grace the hand of a monarch, or of one who stands at a monarch's right hand. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer6Notes: Soothes the pain of all who look upon it. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponSpecial0Notes: Feasts upon foes' life essence to power its wicked strokes. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecial1Notes: Its glittering facets tell the tale of a hero. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
weaponSpecial2Text: Stephen Weber's Shaft of the Dragon
weaponSpecial2Notes: Feel the potency of the dragon surge from within! Increases STR and PER by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecial3Notes: Meetings, monsters, malaise: managed! Mash! Increases STR, INT, and CON by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecialCriticalNotes: This champion slew a critical Github foe where many warriors fell. Fashioned from the bones of Bug, this hammer deals a mighty critical hit. Increases STR and PER by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! This spear allows its user to command any yeti. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A weapon capable of destroying hordes of enemies! It also helps the user make very nice parallel turns. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A powerful mage's staff. Powerfully DELICIOUS, we mean! Two-handed weapon. Increases INT by <%= int %> and PER by <%= per %>.
weaponSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! This wand sparkles with unlimited healing power. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
weaponSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Great for scaling tall buildings, and also for shredding carpets. Adds <%= str %> points to STR. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: This mighty sword can slice foes with ease! It also makes a delicious mid-battle snack. Adds <%= str %> points to STR. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringMageNotes: Only the most powerful rodents can brave their hunger to wield this potent staff. Adds <%= int %> points to INT and <%= per %> points to PER. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringHealerNotes: FETCH! Adds <%= int %> points to INT. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
armorWarrior1Notes: Jerkin of sturdy boiled hide. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior2Notes: Armor of interlocked metal rings. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior3Notes: Suit of all-encasing steel, the pride of knights. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior4Notes: Heavy plate glowing with defensive enchantments. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior5Notes: Looks ceremonial, but no known blade can pierce it. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorRogue1Notes: Leather armor treated to reduce noise. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorRogue2Notes: Colored with dark dye to blend into shadows. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorRogue3Notes: Equally discreet in dungeon or wilderness. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorRogue4Notes: Wraps the wearer in a veil of twilight. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorRogue5Notes: Allows stealth in the open in broad daylight. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorWizard1Notes: Hedge-mage's outfit. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorWizard2Notes: Clothes for a wandering wonder-worker. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorWizard3Notes: Denotes initiation into elite secrets. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorWizard4Notes: Spirits and elementals bow before it. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorWizard5Notes: Symbol of the power behind the throne. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorHealer1Notes: Garment showing humility and purpose. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorHealer2Notes: Worn by those dedicated to tending the wounded in battle. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorHealer3Notes: Turns the healer's own magics inward to fend off harm. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorHealer4Notes: Projects authority and dissipates curses. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorHealer5Notes: Attire of those who have saved the lives of kings. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorSpecial0Notes: Screams when struck, for it feels pain in its wearer's place. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorSpecial1Notes: Its tireless power inures the wearer to mundane discomfort. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
armorSpecial2Notes: Makes you extra fluffy! Increases CON and INT by <%= attrs %> each.
armorSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Fuzzy and fierce. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Full of secret daggers and ski trail maps. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
armorSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Spun from sugar and silk. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
armorSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A robe to keep you warm, even in a blizzard. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
armorSpecialBirthdayNotes: As part of the festivities, Absurd Party Robes are available free of charge in the Item Store! Swath yourself in those silly garbs and don your matching hats to celebrate this momentous day.
armorSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Impeccably groomed. Adds <%= per %> points to PER. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
armorSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Soft as clover, strong as steel! Adds <%= con %> points to CON. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
armorSpecialSpringMageNotes: Mice are nice! Adds <%= int %> points to INT. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
armorSpecialSpringHealerNotes: Warm and snuggly, but protects its owner from harm. Adds <%= con %> points to CON. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
armorMystery201402Notes: Shimmering and strong, these robes have many pockets to carry letters.
armorMystery201403Notes: This mossy armor of woven wood bends with the movement of the wearer.
headWarrior1Notes: Cap of sturdy boiled hide. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headWarrior2Notes: Hood of interlocked metal rings. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headWarrior3Notes: Thick steel helmet, proof against any blow. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headWarrior4Notes: Set with rubies for power, and glows when the wearer is angered. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headWarrior5Notes: Regal crown bound to shining armor. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headRogue1Notes: Basic protective cowl. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headRogue2Notes: Useful for both defense and disguise. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headRogue3Notes: Rugged, but doesn't impede hearing. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headRogue4Notes: Ger perfect syn i mörker. Ökar PER me <%= per %>.
headRogue5Notes: Conceals even thoughts from those who would probe them. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headWizard1Notes: Simple, comfortable, and fashionable. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headWizard2Notes: Traditional headgear of the itinerant wizard. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headWizard3Notes: Adorned with the rings of Saturn. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headWizard4Notes: Focuses the mind for intensive spellcasting. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headWizard5Notes: Shows authority over fortune, weather, and lesser mages. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headHealer1Notes: Jeweled headpiece, for focus on the task at hand. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headHealer2Notes: A taste of luxury for a humble profession. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headHealer3Notes: Shines to let sufferers know their salvation is at hand. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headHealer4Notes: Emits an aura of life and growth. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headHealer5Notes: For king, queen, or miracle-worker. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headSpecial0Notes: Blood and ash, lava and obsidian give this helm its imagery and power. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headSpecial1Notes: The favored crown of those who lead by example. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
headSpecial2Notes: A testament to those who gave of themselves while asking nothing in return. Increases INT and STR by <%= attrs %> each.
headSpecialNyeNotes: You've received an Absurd Party Hat! Wear it with pride while ringing in the New Year!
headSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! An adorably fearsome hat. Increases STR by <%= str %>.
headSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Keeps the wearer's identity secret... and their face toasty. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! This is the most delicious hat in the world. It's also known to appear and disappear mysteriously. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
headSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! The wearer of this crown is never cold. Increases INT by <%= int %>.
headSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Nobody will EVER guess that you are a cat burglar! Adds <%= per %> points to PER. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Welded from sweet meadow clover, this helmet can resist even the mightiest blow. Adds <%= str %> points to STR. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headSpecialSpringMageNotes: This hat stores lots of powerful magic! Try not to nibble it. Adds <%= per %> points to PER. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headSpecialSpringHealerNotes: This crown symbolizes loyalty and companionship. A dog is an adventurer's best friend, after all! Adds <%= int %> points to INT. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headMystery201402Notes: This winged circlet imbues the wearer with the speed of the wind!
shieldWarrior1Notes: Round shield of thick wood. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior2Notes: Light and sturdy, quick to bring to the defense. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior3Notes: Made of wood but bolstered with metal bands. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior4Notes: Rebukes blows with a burst of flame. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior5Notes: Shining badge of the vanguard. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer1Notes: Easy to disengage, freeing a hand for bandaging. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer2Notes: Tapered shield with the symbol of healing. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer3Notes: Traditional shield of defender knights. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer4Notes: Stops blows aimed at nearby innocents as well as those aimed at you. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer5Notes: Tilldelad endast de som är mest dedikerade till kungarikets försvar. Ökar CON med <%= con%>.
shieldSpecial0Notes: Sees beyond the veil of death, and displays what it finds there for enemies to fear. Increases PER by <%= per %>.
shieldSpecial1Notes: Shatters arrows and deflects the words of naysayers. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
shieldSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! This shield reflects light from the snow. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Every shield is unique. Increases CON by <%= con %>.
shieldSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Great for scaling tall buildings, and also for shredding carpets. Adds <%= str %> points to STR. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
shieldSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: This shield never cracks, no matter how hard you hit it! Adds <%= con %> points to CON. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
shieldSpecialSpringHealerNotes: Lets out an obnoxious, continuous squeak when bitten, driving enemies away. Adds <%= con %> points to CON. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
backMystery201402Notes: These shining wings have feathers that glitter in the sun!
headAccessorySpecialSpringRogueNotes: These feline ears twitch to detect incoming threats. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Bunny ears that keenly detect every crunch of a carrot. Confers no status bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringMageNotes: These round mouse ears are silky-soft. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringHealerNotes: Floppy but cute. Wanna play? Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headAccessoryMystery201403Notes: These antlers shimmer with moss and lichen.
